snippet: The president’s effort comes in the wake of a series of high-profile computer breaches, the most recent involving the military’s Central Command.
abstract: Pres Obama asks Congress to pass legislation to increase cybersecurity across government and industry.
lead_paragraph: The president’s effort comes in the wake of a series of high-profile computer breaches, the most recent involving the military’s Central Command.

headline.main: Obama Calls for New Laws to Bolster Cybersecurity
headline.print_headline: Obama Calls for New Laws to Bolster Cybersecurity
